name: Dash Around The Clock
description:
A Game for MAcOS only.

Dash Around The Clock is a game made in 17h for Ludum Dare 50. Theme was : "Delay the Inevitable". In this game, you try to survive a clock that goes faster and faster while horde of enemies are surrounding you. Also, if you don’t knock out the enemies off the arena by dashing on them, you will lose control of your dash, which will be a big problem to handle !

(Warning : You also lose life by touching the boundaries of the clock)

I wanted the player to lose control of his character and the world around him so he would inevitably die. But you can try to delay your own death. Thanks to people that will try this game and give feedbacks !

Have fun !
